ygData.subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat
ygData.msgSnippet: He stood up wipped the fluid from his eyes and became all serious. It has flaws but I think we can make it work. But I ask one favor leave the maximals be. I

Subject: Re: Destructor confronts Kit Kat

 He stood up wipped the fluid from his eyes and became all serious. "It has 
flaws but I think we can make it work. But I ask one favor leave the maximals 
be. I need them. Please........." sudenly he felt a pain. His eyes went blank 
and he collapsed.  Directly into stasis lock.When he hit the floor a hole 
leaking meck fluid in his back showed. A wound from the battle outside. He 
was so concerned about his love for kit kat he never felt. Oh the power of 
love.
